text: Waterloo is a community in Clark County, Missouri, United States. The community is located in Northeastern Missouri, near the border with Iowa along the Des Moines and Mississippi rivers. Nearby towns include Kahoka, Revere and Wayland. A post office called Waterloo was established in 1837, and remained in operation until 1876. Waterloo held the first county seat. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Clark County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Waterloo, Clark County, Missouri
